schema.title: Purchase
schema.description: Purchases tokens based on the specified limit or amount of funds sent.

ui:options.title: Purchase
ui:options.info: A sale needs to be in progress in order to purchase tokens.

ui:options.title: Max Tokens Able to Be Purchased
ui:options.description: An optional limit to the number of tokens to purchase.
ui:options.info: If number_of_tokens is not specified, the maximum number of tokens are purchased based on the funds allocated (Unless we reach the maximum allowed).
